bibl.title: Euripides, Bacchae. Edited with Introduction and Commentary.
bibl.note: See pp. lii-lv: Introduction, Part IV, Section 3, which describes two unpublished fragments of the Bacchae, communicated by: C.H. Roberts; - 229-231: Appendix: Additional fragments attributable to the Bacchae.
Dodds E.R., Euripides, Bacchae. Edited with Introduction and Commentary.
